resources.string: "There is no need to throw old books when not in use or not need to keep them in store rooms ! We are here to help you.My shop Royal Book Depot deals with secondhand books. You can sell your books to us at half price of the book.You can also purchase books from us as we sell the secondhand books. Make order fast !! for more information go the the website link provided below."
Shop No 8, 9 Amritpuram, Surajpur Kasna Road, Greater Noida, Noida - 201310, Near Jagat Farm Golchakkar
